If you disagree, you will not be able to use our product or service.

To enhance your experience with %s and ensure the secure and stable operation of our app, we have integrated a third-party software development kit (SDK) to enable certain functionalities. \nRest assured that we prioritize your data security and conduct rigorous testing on the SDK. We will not collect information in a coercive or bundled manner solely based on your agreement with the privacy policy. \nBy tapping the button, you agree to accept our services.
